original: FREDRIKSSON, C O, »Vaggeryd», Vagge-ryd, f 4/3 83. Anst i skrädd.lära Visingsö 94, prakt öl sthlms.fmor 03—07. Gr G O Fredrikssons Skrädd o Herrekip 10, AB 42, deläg o fmateckn dta. Ordf Vaggeryds köpm.frn. 0 FREDRIKS S ÖN, John Erik Wilhelm, Civilingenjör, Karlstad, f Hossmo, Kalm l, 4/10 96 av lantbr J F o Hilda Karlsson, gm Margit Flodman. Studex Kalm 15, KTH (maskin-byggn o mek tekn) 15—19. Ing v AB Vattenbyggn.byrån Sthlm 20—21, konstr v AB Karlst Mek Verkst :s turbinavd 22—24, v AB Bofors 24—26, åter v AB Karlst Mek Verkst :s turbinavd 26. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated: FREDRIKSSON, C O, "Vaggeryd", Vagge-ryd, born 4/3 83. Employed as an apprentice in tailoring in Visingsö from 1894, practical training in Stockholm's fashion trade from 1903 to 1907. Became a partner in G O Fredriksson's Tailoring and Men's Clothing in 1910, AB 1942, co-owner and head clerk's daughter. Chairman of Vaggeryd's Merchants' Association since 1900. Married FREDRIKS S ÖN, John Erik Wilhelm, Civil Engineer, Karlstad, born in Hossmo, Kalmar l, on 4/10 96 to farmer J F and Hilda Karlsson, married to Margit Flodman. Graduated from Kalm in 1915, KTH (mechanical engineering and mechanical technology) 1915-1919. Worked as an engineer at AB Vattenbyggn.byrån Sthlm from 1920 to 1921, construction work at AB Karlst Mek Verkst:s turbine department from 1922 to 1924, again at AB Bofors from 1924 to 1926, and back to AB Karlst Mek Verkst:s turbine department in 1926. A member of the Swedish Technical Association.

structured.name: C O Fredriksson
structured.description: Born on 4/3 1883 in Vagge-ryd, Sweden. Employed as an apprentice in tailoring in Visingsö from 1894 to 1903. Undertook practical training in Stockholm's fashion trade from 1903 to 1907. Became a partner and head clerk's daughter of G O Fredriksson's Tailoring and Men's Clothing in 1910. Became a co-owner of AB in 1942. Chairman of Vaggeryd's Merchants' Association since 1900.

spouse.name: John Erik Wilhelm Fredriks Sön
spouse.description: Civil Engineer, born on 4/10 1896 in Hossmo, Kalmar l, Sweden. Son of farmer J F and Hilda Karlsson. Married to Margit Flodman.

education.description: Studied at Kalm from 1915 and graduated. Also studied at KTH (mechanical engineering and mechanical technology) from 1915 to 1919.
